name: OpenApiCompare_fromSpecificationsTest
description: Unit tests for the OpenApiCompare.fromSpecifications method.

test_cases.name: testFromSpecifications_Success
test_cases.description: Tests the successful creation of ChangedOpenApi from valid OpenAPI specifications.

test_cases.name: testFromSpecifications_NullOldSpec
test_cases.description: Tests that a RuntimeException is thrown when the old specification is null.

test_cases.name: testFromSpecifications_NullNewSpec
test_cases.description: Tests that a RuntimeException is thrown when the new specification is null.
